inclusion.criterion: scheduled for liver biopsy prior to treatment
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: off treatment for at least three months
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: time between FibroScan reading and biopsy not exceed six months
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: subject able to give informed consent
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: unable or unwilling to provide informed consent
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: confirmed diagnosis and/or history of malignancy
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: receiving anti-viral therapy for HCV or HBV within 3 months prior to FibroScan and liver biopsy
exclusion.label: not_met
